details.title: Set Filter Conditions
details.description: Allows to select a project, release and sprints.

outputendpoint.name: build-filter-list
outputendpoint.label: Build Filter
outputendpoint.description: Provides the condition list for filtering builds using the selected sprints and the selected user (e.g. by connecting this endpoint to the Condition List endpoint of the AND Filter operator)

outputendpoint.name: issue-filter
outputendpoint.label: Issue Filter
outputendpoint.description: Provides the condition list for filtering issues using the selected sprints and the selected user (e.g. by connecting this endpoint to the Condition List endpoint of the AND Filter operator)
